summary: A command‑line utility that loads a Megatron‑based Griffin model saved in NVIDIA NeMo format, extracts its configuration and weights, translates them into a HuggingFace RecurrentGemma model configuration, and writes the converted checkpoint for use with the HuggingFace Transformers library.
business_intent: Enable seamless migration of pretrained Griffin language models from the NeMo ecosystem to the HuggingFace ecosystem, allowing developers to leverage existing NeMo checkpoints in standard transformer pipelines, deployment tools, and community sharing platforms.
